## GitDocumentDB.allDocs property

Get all the documents in a repository.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
allDocs: (options?: AllDocsOptions | undefined) => Promise<{
        total_rows: 0;
    } | {
        total_rows: number;
        commit_sha: string;
        rows: DocumentInBatch[];
    }>;
```
